All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractBaseHandler
An interface for file selection
CellGridView
This class creates a GridPane of ToggleButtons to be connected with NonogramMakerModel in NonogramMakerPresenter.
JavaFXExample
 
Main
Where the stage is set and everything runs
NonogramMakerModel
This class is the model for the NonogramMaker.
NonogramMakerPresenter
This class connects NonogramMakerModel and NonogramMaker view and presents them.
NonogramMakerView
Creates the entire GUI for the project.
Openable
Specifies that a class has a special method for opening a file.
Openable
 
OpenHandler
Used for classes that need to open or save a file.
Saveable
Specifies that a class has a special method for saving a file.
SaveHandler
Handles saving operations.
ToggleButtonEventHandler
Implements an EventHandler for ToggleButtons in CellGridView
